property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the FindChangeInnerShadowSetting &#40;a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).

property.name: xOffset
property.shortdesc: The horizontal offset of the shadow. Can return: Unit &#40;-1000 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: yOffset
property.shortdesc: The vertical offset of the shadow. Can return: Unit &#40;-1000 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: applied
property.shortdesc: If true, the inner shadow effect is applied. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: effectColor
property.shortdesc: The color applied to the inner shadow, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127. . Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: blendMode
property.shortdesc: The blending mode for the inner shadow effect. Can return: BlendMode enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: opacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity &#40;as a percentage) of the inner shadow. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: angle
property.shortdesc: The angle at which the inner shadow is thrown. &#40;Range: -360 to 360). Can return: Real (-180 - 180) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: distance
property.shortdesc: The distance between the FindChangeInnerShadowSetting and the shadow. . Can return: Unit &#40;0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: useGlobalLight
property.shortdesc: If true, the global light angle is used. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: chokeAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount to choke the inner shadow &#40;as a percentage of shadow size). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The size of the inner shadow. Can return: Unit &#40;0 - 144 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: noise
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) of noise to add to the shadow. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeInnerShadowSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
